body.name: UNNMIIY Smart Toilet, One Piece Bidet Toilet for Bathrooms, Auto Smart Toilet with LED Display, Warm Water Sprayer & Dryer, Foot Sensor Operation, Toilet with Heated Bidet Seat
body.stockDetail: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.
features: Completely smart and luxuriously customizable - Smart toilets bring you a luxurious and personalized experience. Various functions allow setting according to your own habits. Everything can be controlled automatically on the smart toilet itself or with the included remote. All of these functions stop when you leave the toilet, so it's a real energy saver.

Automatically opens, closes and flushes - UNNMIIY'S smart toilet is equipped with smart sensors and is completely hands-free: the lid automatically opens when you approach and closes automatically for flushing when you move away. The toilet has strong thrust. Pre-wet the toilet before use to reduce flushing difficulty and save water. In addition, our smart toilets have a backup flush function in the event of a power outage.

Controls, Display and Night Light - The smart bidet comes with easy-to-operate buttons, remote and touch keys for convenience and a personalized experience. LED display shows real-time water temperature/seat temperature/drying temperature. Night lights are perfect for anyone who needs to use the bathroom in the middle of the night.

Multifunctional Cleaning - The multifunctional cleaning function of this smart toilet provides a comprehensive and customized cleaning experience. With options like front and rear washing, adjustable water pressure and temperature, and pulsating spray patterns, you can personalize your cleaning routine to your liking.

Multiple functional fountain washing modes - The advanced smart toilet includes rear washing, front washing, constant temperature washing, lady care washing, powerful washing and sliding massage washing. Adjust water temperature, water pressure, dryer temperature and hot seat temperature via remote control. Enjoy high-end toilet cleaning functions.

Easy installation and lifetime service - The UNNMIIY smart toilet comes with detailed instructions and accessories. Simple installation of bidet toilet. We promise to provide lifetime service for our bidet toilets, if you need any help, please feel free to contact us and we will reply to your message within 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DETAILED DESCRIPTION LED DISPLAY & REMOTE CONTROL Real-time display the temperature dynamicly With intelligent dual control , the LCD screen displays the usage of the toilet function in real-time. MULTIPLE SAFETY PROTECTION UNNMIIY's advanced smart toilet is made of high-quality ceramic materials. Using high-density waterproof technology to achieve waterproof effect. MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS Water discharge: 750ml/min; Outlet water temperature: 40°C; Alternating voltage : 110V+10%,50HZ/60HZ REMOTE CONTROL Can also be operated by remote control All functions in one hand, flips the toilet lid and automatically flushes and closes when leaving.

UNNMIIY SMART TOILET WITH DIVERSE FUNCTIONS Under the lid you'll find a smart, comfortable seat with a flat, wide seating area, a premium smart toilet designed for durability and comfort and versatility. IPX4 WATERPROOF Advanced durable waterproof material The body of the Smart Bidet Toilet Seat is covered with a durable, high-grade polypropylene material that can support heavy weight, and its waterproof technology is reliable to withstand severe moisture and moisture in your bathroom or toilet. Super luxurious HD LED screen Night Light & Digital Display Water temperature, seat temperature, and drying temperature are visible. Night lights can help you navigate in the dark. RINSE WITH HOT WATER LED lights and touch-free switches WHY CHOOSE UNNMIIY SMART TOILET? Enjoy a high-quality smart toilet UNNMIIY SMART TOILET UNNMIIY is committed to the research, development and promotion of energy-saving and innovative intelligent bathrooms, and we have a professional research team and an always-on customer team.

Actual parameter Voltage AC 110V 50/60Hz Heating water tank 0.3L；Inlet water temperature：1℃-30℃；Inlet water pressure ：0.15-0.75MPa Warm water temperature Temperature adjustment range: 30℃-40℃ Water spray volume about 0.35-1.2L/MINS (when water pressure is 0.2MPa)（Nozzle position 50mm-90mm） Heater power: 1400W Safety devices: flow sensor, water temperature sensor, temperature sensitive switch, temperature fuse Rated power 1300W (inlet water temperature 15℃+2C, water pressure 0.2MPa)) Wind speed 24 meters/second Drying heating power 250W Air temperature 4-stage adjustment (room temperature - about 55C) Surface temperature four-stage adjustment (room temperature - about 40C) Safety device temperature controller, temperature fuse Seat heating power 45W Safety device temperature controller and temperature fuse Switch structure The seat ring and seat ring cover are equipped with damping and buffering devices Safety device equipped with leakage protection device and seating sensor Power cord length 1.5m

PROFESSIONAL INSTALLATION MANUAL INSTRUCTIONS: Installation Manual (PDF) can be downloaded on our product page Product type: one-piece toilet. Structural form: Siamese. Drainage method: ground drainage Flushing Type: Pressure Assist, Siphon Jet. Amount of water per flush: 0.924 - 1.056 gallons Note: The amount of water used for flushing and draining is actually related to the water pressure (the angle valve can adjust the water pressure) Angle valve outer tooth specification: 1/2;VI angle valve adapter male specification: 7/8(Our angle valves are generally suitable for 1/2 size, and we also provide 7/8 angle valve adapters to avoid individual customers needing 7/8 connectors)Note: It is recommended that the water pipe specification of the customer's home is 1/2 internal teeth or 7/8 internal teeth. The vertical distance between the center of the sewage outlet and the wall: 11.8 inches Note: It is recommended that the diameter of the sewage outlet of the customer's home is 3.94-4.72in. Remote troubleshooting: Use the buttons on the toilet body to determine whether flushing is normal and whether the trial run is normal (cleaning and drying are started after sitting down). Emergency troubleshooting:When there is no water supply, put more than 2.1 gallons (8 liters) of water into a bucket and rinse the ceramic cavity. Note: Avoid water from overflowing from the chamber.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful toilet
reviews.reviewText: I fell in love with the toilet in the advertisement at first sight. When I bought it, it was exactly the same as the one in the advertisement. I was pleasantly surprised. Its cleaning function and seat heating gave me a different experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for money toilet
reviews.reviewText: It is specially bought for sick elderly people. We invested in hiring installers to install it. It is a product worth investing in. It automatically opens the toilet lid, automatically flushes water, heats the seat cushion, and cleans the buttocks. I highly recommend buying it.
